metadata.title: CVE-2019-20792 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: OpenSC before 0.20.0 has a double free in coolkey_free_private_data becausecoolkey_add_object in libopensc/card-coolkey.c lacks a uniqueness check.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
